EmailTemplate.name: PS Ticket Acknowledgement EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Ticket Acknowledgement : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Issue_Reported_By__c},
Kindly be informed that ticket {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName}. Your request is being analyzed and further information will be provided as soon as possible.
In the meantime, should you require additional information, please reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com. Please quote the ticket number for any communication related to this request.
Details of the Issue:
{!Case.Subject}
Regards, Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
